mapper.insert: insert into vehicle (vehicle_id, vehicle_model, origin, route_number, date, purchase_date, notes) values (#{vehicleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicleModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{routeNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{purchaseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update vehicle set vehicle_model = #{vehicleModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, origin = #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, route_number = #{routeNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, purchase_date = #{purchaseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, notes = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where vehicle_id = #{vehicleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select vehicle_id, vehicle_model, origin, route_number, date, purchase_date, notes from vehicle
